scripts.mint: flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/mintNFT.cdc --network=emulator 'TOBIRA NEKO #1' 'G0 eye-colour:#F2E205 eye-type:smile pattern-colour:#F2C46D base-colour:#F2DF80 Figure:A nose-colour:#F2E205' 'https://storage.googleapis.com/tobiratory-dev_media/nft/tobiraneko/1.jpg'
scripts.mint2: flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/mintNFT.cdc --network=emulator --signer emulator-account-2 'TOBIRA NEKO #2' 'G1 eye-colour:#F2E205 eye-type:smile pattern-colour:#F2C46D base-colour:#F2DF80 Figure:A nose-colour:#F2E206' 'https://storage.googleapis.com/tobiratory-dev_media/nft/tobiraneko/2.jpg'
